description: '''Soluna Samay Kettel'''{{Pronunciation needed}} (born 27 August 1990, [[Guatemala City]], [[Guatemala]]) is a Guatemalan-Danish singer of Swiss and German origin based in Denmark. Samay represented [[Denmark in the Eurovision Song Contest 2012|Denmark]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2012]] in [[Baku]], [[Azerbaijan]] with her entry "[[Should've Known Better (Soluna Samay song)|Should've Known Better]]."
